topic.title: Linkus Client Settings
topic.shortdesc: Enable or disable Linkus client for the extension users, send Linkus emails to the users, and edit the Linkus email template.

section.title: Linkus Client
section.p: With Linkus, all the features of a desk phone can be realized by your mobile device and desktop. Available using Microsoft Windows, macOS, iOS, and Android, Linkus makes real-time communication easy across multiple devices.
To know more about the Linkus Client, refer to the Linkus Help.
